scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The General Subseries includes A Day in the Life of an Archaeologist in Sudanese Nubia, (1962) in French and English; Living and Working Conditions for Archaeologists in Sudanese Nubia (undated); the original version (with original drawings and photographs) of Pottery Wares of the Ptolemaic and Roman Periods at Qasr Ibrim: Preliminary ware descriptions field manual, approximately 1980; and a numbered set (1-28, not consecutive) of Adams' writings, mostly typescript (undated).
